AccountFinancialSummary.name: AccountFinancialSummary
AccountFinancialSummary.description: Represents the summary of financial details associated with an account.

AccountId.description: The associated account for which the financial summary is                       computed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

LatestTransactionDate.description: The date on which the latest transaction related to any of the                       financial accounts was recorded.

LatestTransactionUpdatedDt.description: The date when the latest transaction was last updated.

Name.description: The name of the account financial summary record.

PartyRelationshipGroupId.description: The party relationship group associated with the account.

TotalFinancialAccountBal.description: The net balance of all the financial accounts associated with the                       account.

TotFinclAcctBalanceUpdtDt.description: The date when the total financial account balance was last                       updated.

TotalHeldFinclAcctValue.description: The total combined value of all financial accounts held with the                       financial institution.

TotHldFinclAcctValUpdtDt.description: The date when the total held financial account value was last                       updated.

TotalInsurancePolicyCount.description: The total number of active insurance policies associated with the                       account.

TotInsurancePlcyCntUpdtDt.description: The date when the total insurance policy count was last                       updated.

TotalLiabilityValue.description: The total value of all the liabilities associated with the                       account.

TotLiabilityValueUpdtDate.description: The date when the total liability value was last updated.

TotalNonFinancialAssetVal.description: The total value of all the non-financial assets associated with                       the account.

TotNonFinclAssetValUpdtDt.description: The date when the total non-financial asset value was last                       updated.

TotalBankDepositValue.description: The total value of all the bank deposits associated with the                       account.

TotalBankDepositValUpdtDt.description: The date when the total bank deposit value was last updated.

TotalClaimCount.description: The total number of insurance claims associated with the account.

TotalClaimCountUpdtDate.description: The date when the total claim count was last updated.

TotalFinancialAccountCount.description: The total count of all the financial accounts associated with the                       account.

TotalFinclAcctCountUpdtDt.description: The date when the total financial account count was last                       updated.

TotalGrossWrittenPremAmt.description: The sum of all gross premium amounts for all active insurance                       policies associated with the account.

TotalGrWrtPremAmtUpdtDt.description: The date when the total gross written premium amount was last                       updated.

TotalInvestmentValue.description: The total value of all the investment accounts associated with the                       account.

TotalInvestmentValUpdtDt.description: The date when the total investment value was last updated.

TotalManagedInvestmentValue.description: The total managed investment value of all the investment accounts                       managed by the financial institution.

TotalMngInvstValUpdtDate.description: The date when the total managed investment value was last                       computed.

TotalOtsdCreditAmount.description: The sum of the outstanding amounts of automotive loans, credit                       cards, home equity line of credits, mortgages, and loan accounts                       associated with the account.

TotalOtsdCreditAmtUpdtDt.description: The date when the total outstanding credit amount was last                       updated.

TotalPaidClaimAmount.description: The sum of all the claim amounts paid for the claims associated                       with the account.

TotalPaidClaimAmtUpdtDate.description: The date when the total paid claim amount was last updated.

TotalPremiumAmount.description: The sum of premium amounts of all the active policies associated                       with the account.

TotalPremiumAmountUpdtDate.description: The date when the total premium amount was last updated.

TotalSumInsured.description: The sum of the insured values of all the active policies                       associated with the account.

TotalSumInsuredUpdtDate.description: The date when the total sum insured was last updated.

AccountParticipant.name: AccountParticipant
AccountParticipant.description: Represents information about a participant in the context of an account       record.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this participant is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: An automatically generated name for the participant.

ParticipantId.description: The ID of the user or group related to the participant.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The ID of the object-based role for this participant.

AppFormProdtPrpsAttribute.name: AppFormProdtPrpsAttribute
AppFormProdtPrpsAttribute.description: Represents the attributes and values of an Application Form Product Proposal          record.

AppFormProductProposalId.description: Application form product proposal to which the attribute is                       associated.

ExternalId.description: The ID that unique references the relationship in an external data                       source.

AppFormProductCollateral.name: AppFormProductCollateral
AppFormProductCollateral.description: Represents a physical or financial asset that is pledged as collateral for an          application form product.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The Application Form Product associated with the application form                       product collateral. For example, A product, such as a loan, that's                       applied for and secured by a pledged financial asset as                       collateral.

CollateralAssetId.description: The financial or physical asset reference pledge as                       collateral.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

PartyFinancialAssetId.description: The Party Financial Asset associated with the application form                       product collateral. For example, a party's financial asset that's                       pledged as collateral for a loan.

PartyFinancialAssetLienId.description: The lien for party financial asset that is created when the                       collateral is approved and the lender's legal claim is                       registered.

PledgedValue.description: The value declared for the party financial asset that's intended                       to be used as collateral.

Status.description: Specifies the current evaluation status of the application form                       product collateral to determine the party financial asset's                       eligibility as collateral.

AppFormProductParticipant.name: AppFormProductParticipant
AppFormProductParticipant.description: Represents information about the application form product          participant.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The application form product associated with the participant.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the application form product participant is                       active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the application form product participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant that's associated with the application form.

ParticipantRoleId.description: Represents details like the name and associated default access                       level for a role that a participant can have in the context of a                       parent record.

Applicant.name: Applicant
Applicant.description: Represents information about the individual or group that are applying.

AccountId.description: The account ID associated with the applicant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application that's submitted for a product request.

BirthDate.description: The date of birth of the applicant.

BusinessEntityName.description: The registered name of the business entity associated with the                       applicant.

BusinessEntityPrimCtctId.description: The primary contact for the business entity associated with the                       applicant.

BusinessEntityType.description: Specifies the type of the business entity associated with the                       applicant.

ContactId.description: The related contact ID assocaited with the account.

Email.description: The email address of the applicant.

FirstName.description: The first name of the applicant.

GroupExposure.description: The sum of all existing loans an applicant has with the financial                       institution to which they’re applying for a new loan.

LastName.description: The last name of the applicant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the applicant.

Name.description: A unique number that represents the applicant.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile requesting a product with the application                       form.

PhoneType.description: Specifies the type of phone number provided by the applicant.

Role.description: Specifies the role of the applicant.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the application for a product that is                       submitted by the applicant.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the applicant.

UniqueReferenceNumber.description: The customer reference number of the applicant.

ApplicantApplicantRelation.name: ApplicantApplicantRelation
ApplicantApplicantRelation.description: Represents the relationship between applicants, where an applicant can be          either a business entity or an individual.

ApplicantId.description: Represents information about a group that is applying.

ApplicantRole.description: Specifies how the applicant organization is associated with the                       related applicant.

DecisionMakingAuthorityType.description: Specifies the type of the decision-making authority.

DeclarationType.description: Specifies the formal manner or approach used to officially state                       the stakeholder's role or position.

IsDecisionMakingAuthority.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a decision-making authority                       (true) or not (false).

IsShareholder.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a shareholder (true) or not                       (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Auto-number identifier for the relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with the relationship.

RelatedApplicantId.description: The individual or group that's associated with the applicant.

RelatedApplicantRole.description: Specifies how the related applicant is associated with the                       applicant organization.

ShareholderHierarchyLevel.description: Specifies the hierarchical level between the account and the                       intermediate shareholder. The shareholder hierarchy level is                       applicable only to an intermediate share holder.

ShareholderType.description: Specifies the type of the shareholder.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship between the applicant and the                       related applicant started.

TotalSharePercent.description: The total percentage of shares owned by the stakeholder, combining                       both direct and indirect ownership.

ApplicationActionItem.name: ApplicationActionItem
ApplicationActionItem.description: Stores the action items assigned to a user on an application.

AssignedToId.description: The user assigned to the action item.

Description.description: The description of the action item.

DueDate.description: The due date of the action item.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the application action item record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the application action item                       record.

RelatedApplnActnItmId.description: The related application action item that is created to manage a                       subsequent action item that is generated from an earlier action                       item. For example, if uploading identity proof documents is the                       main action item, then verifying the uploaded documents is a                       related action item.

RelatedRecordId.description: The record related to the action item.

Status.description: The status of the action item.

Subject.description: The subject of the application action item.

Type.description: The type of application action item.

ApplicationForm.name: ApplicationForm
ApplicationForm.description: Represents the high level information of an application that's submitted for          the product.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the application.

BranchUnitId.description: The ID of the branch unit that owns the application.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeadId.description: The ID of the lead associated with the application.

Name.description: The name of the application.

OpportunityId.description: The ID of the opportunity associated with the application.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

Stage.description: The stage in the approval process of the application.

SubmissionDate.description: The date when the application is submitted.

ThirdPartyLoanProviderAccountId.description: The ID of the third party loan provider account associated with                       the application.

ApplicationFormEvaluation.name: ApplicationFormEvaluation
ApplicationFormEvaluation.description: Represents the details of the evaluation performed for an application form.          For example, the details of the evaluation of a loan application form by an          underwriter.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form that was evaluated.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The product in the application form that's being evaluated.

Comments.description: The evaluator's comments to the evaluation.

Date.description: The date when the evaluation was performed.

Decision.description: Specifices the decision of the evaluation.

EvaluatorId.description: The User or Group who evaluated the application form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the application form evaluation record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ApplicationFormParticipant.name: ApplicationFormParticipant
ApplicationFormParticipant.description: Represents information about the application form participant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form associated with the participant.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the application form participant is active                          (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the application form participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant that's associated with the application form.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The default access level for a role that a participant can have in                       the context of a parent record.

ApplicationFormProduct.name: ApplicationFormProduct
ApplicationFormProduct.description: Represents a junction between the application and the product requested by an          applicant.

ApplicantVisibleStatus.description: Specifies the status of the application form product that is                       visible to the applicant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application that's submitted for a product request.

DisbursementMethod.description: Specifies the method of disbursement for the loan amount.

HasAutomaticPayment.description: Indicates whether the applicant opted in for automatic payments                       (true) or not (false).

HasElectronicStatement.description: Indicates whether the customer opted in for electronic statements                       (true) or not (false).

IsAtmCardRequired.description: Indicates whether an ATM card is required (true) or not                       (false).

IsCheckbookRequired.description: Indicates if a checkbook is required (true) or not (false) for the                       application form product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanType.description: Specifies the type of loan being requested.

Name.description: The name of the Application Form Product record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

OwnershipType.description: The type of ownership for the application form product.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the application form product.

RequestedAmount.description: The amount requested as part of the application.

RequestedTerm.description: The length of the loan in months.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the application form product that is                       submitted by the applicant.

ApplicationFormProductDev.name: ApplicationFormProductDev
ApplicationFormProductDev.description: Represents a junction between an application form product and a          deviation.

ApplicantId.description: The Applicant who submitted the application.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application that's submitted for a product request.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The product that's being applied for in the application.

ApprovalStatus.description: The approval status of the deviation.

ApproverComments.description: The approver's comments to the deviation.

ApproverId.description: The individual or group who approves the deviation.

Description.description: The description of the deviation.

DeviationId.description: The deviation requested for processing the application form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MinimumApproverLevel.description: Specifies the minimum level of the approver who can approve the                       deviation.

Name.description: The name of the application form product deviation record.

ReviewerComments.description: The reviewer's comments after assessing the deviation. For                       example, comments from an Underwriter.

ApplicationFormProductFee.name: ApplicationFormProductFee
ApplicationFormProductFee.description: Represents the fees associated with an application form.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The product that’s being applied for in the application.

ApplicationFormProductProposalId.description: The product proposal with which the fee is associated.

FeeAmount.description: The fee amount that's paid by the applicant.

FeeType.description: The type of fee paid by an applicant.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the application form product fee record.

ProductFeeId.description: The base fee associated to the product.

ApplicationFormProductProposal.name: ApplicationFormProductProposal
ApplicationFormProductProposal.description: Represents the proposal presented by the financial institution to the          applicant with details of interest rate, monthly payment, validity dates, and total          interest.

AdditionalDetails.description: The additional information about the proposal.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form associated with the proposal.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The application form product that the proposal is associated                       with.

InterestRate.description: The interest rate for the product.

InterestRateType.description: The type of interest rate for the product.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the offer is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

MonthlyPayment.description: The details of the monthly payment.

Name.description: The name of theproduct proposal record of an application                       form.

ValidEndDate.description: The end date of the proposal.

ValidStartDate.description: The start date of the proposal.

ApplicationFormSellerItem.name: ApplicationFormSellerItem
ApplicationFormSellerItem.description: Represents a junction between an application form and a seller          product.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The product that's being applied for in the application. For                       example, home loan or auto loan.

BuiltUpArea.description: The built-up area of the property.

BuiltUpAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the built up area.

ConstructionStage.description: The construction stage of the property.

EngineNumber.description: The engine number of the vehicle.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related                       to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Make.description: The make of the seller item.

Mileage.description: The mileage of the seller item.

Model.description: The model of the seller item.

Name.description: The seller item name.

PartyFinancialAssetId.description: The iformation about the financial asset owned by an individual or                       account.

PropertyPostalCode.description: The postal code of the property.

PropertyUnitIdentifier.description: The unit identifier of the property.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The product that the applicant has shown interest in buying. For                       example, a home or vehicle.

ScheduledDeliveryDate.description: The delivery date of the product to the applicant.

SellerId.description: The seller ID of the seller item.

Trim.description: The trim type of the seller item.

Type.description: The type of product.

VehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The unique identifier for the vehicle.

VehicleRegistrationNumber.description: The registration number of the vehicle.

Year.description: The  manufacture date of the seller item.

ApplicationFormTerm.name: ApplicationFormTerm
ApplicationFormTerm.description: Represents the terms associated with an application form for a loan or a          lease.

ApplicationFormId.description: A form that captures the applicant requirements for a financial                       product application.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date till which a term is related to an application form.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from which a term is related to an application form.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the application form term is active (true), or                       not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: Name of the application form term.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The product or proposal related to an application form term.

TermDetail.description: A detailed description about the term related to an application                       form that's referenced during the decisioning process.

TermId.description: A term related to an application form that represents conditions                       offered to the customer.

AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user who performs an appraisal.

Comment.description: The dealer or customer provides a comment for the appraisal, such                       as instructions or context.

FinalAppraisalValue.description: The final appraisal value that sums up the total item final value                       and the total adjustment value of an appraisal.

InitiatedById.description: The account, contact, or user who initiates an appraisal.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the appraisal is active (true) or not                       (false).

OwnerId.description: The owner of the appraisal record.

PurposeType.description: Specifies the purpose of the appraisal, such as sales, trade-in,                       or valuation of an asset.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record of an object, such as lead, account, opportunity, or                       application form product that serves as the context for the                       appraisal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the appraisal.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer                       to an appraisal.

TotalItemFinalValue.description: The cumulative value based on all the final values of all items                       related to the appraisal.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the appraisal.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date until which the appraisal is valid.

AdjustedById.description: The contact or the user that performs the adjustment.

AdjustmentValue.description: The positive or negative value of the appraisal adjustment.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal record for which an adjustment is made.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item record for which an adjustment is made

Description.description: The description of the appraisal adjustment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp indicating the last time the current user viewed a                       related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp indicating when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The name of the appraisal adjustment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the adjustment.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the appraisal adjustment.

Address.description: The address of the appraisal item.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal associated with the appraisal item.

AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user that appraises the item.

ConditionType.description: Specifies the condition of the item that is appraised.

CustomerAskingValue.description: The value of the item proposed by the customer for the                       appraisal.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of the item that is appraised.

FinalValue.description: The final value of the appraisal item.

IdentificationNumber.description: The identification number of the item that is appraised.

InitialValue.description: The preliminary value for the appraisal based on provider                       estimates.

InstallDate.description: The date that the item is installed.

IsAddOnIncluded.description: Indicates whether the item includes an add on (true) or not                       (false).

IsCustomized.description: Indicates whether the item is customized (true) or not                       (false).

IsHandoverComplete.description: Indicates whether the handover is complete for the appraisal item                       (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

LicensePlateNumber.description: The license plate number of the vehicle that is appraised.

MakeName.description: Specifies the make name of the item that is appraised.

ManufacturedDate.description: The date that the item is manufactured.

ModelName.description: Specifies the model of the item that is appraised.

ModelYear.description: Specifies the year when the model of the item is first                       launched.

OwnershipType.description: Specifies the type of ownership of the item.

PurchaseDate.description: The date that the item is purchased.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The existing record of the item related to the appraisal as                       referenced in the application, such as an Asset or Vehicle record                       with a serial number or a vehicle identification number.

RegistrationState.description: The state where the item that is appraised is registered.

RegistrationZipCode.description: The ZIP code of the item that is appraised.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer                       to this appraisal item.

Trim.description: The trim levels supported by the item that is appraised.

Type.description: Specifies the type of item that forms the basis for the                       appraisal.

Usage.description: The usage of the item that is appraised.

UsageUnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the usage.

WarrantyEndDate.description: The end date of the warranty of the item that is appraised.

AppraisalItemId.description: The appraisal item that's associated with the appraisal source                       valuation.

AverageConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's average condition.

CleanConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in clean condition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                       record.

Name.description: The autopopulated name of Appraisal Item Provider Valuation                       record.

ProviderName.description: The name of the provider that gives the valuation of the                       item.

RoughConditionValue.description: The value of the item if it's in rough condition.

ValuationDateTime.description: The date and time when the source gives the valuation of the                       item.

AuthFormRequestRecord.name: AuthFormRequestRecord
AuthFormRequestRecord.description: Junction between an Authorization Request and the Salesforce record that is          being authorized. For example. the actual financial Salesforce records shared with third          parties or any Salesforce record being shared as a result of the consent request.

InfoAuthRequestFormId.description: Link to the Information Authorization Request Form related to this                       record.

InfoAuthorizationRequestId.description: Link to the Information Authorization Request related to this                       record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the authorization form request record.

RelatedRecordId.description: Link to the Salesforce Record related to this record.

AuthorizedInsuranceLine.name: AuthorizedInsuranceLine
AuthorizedInsuranceLine.description: Represents the insurance lines that an insurance company is authorized to       sell.

Country.description: The country where the insurance company can sell this insurance line.

InsuranceLine.description: The insurance line that the insurance company is authorized to sell.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LegalEntityId.description: Legal entity ID of the insurance company that this authorization has been            issued to.

Name.description: An auto-number identifier for the insurance line.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Award.name: Award
Award.description: Represents a person's or organization's professional awards.

AccountI.description: ID of the organization receiving the award.

ContactI.description: Person who received the award and is listed as a                                  contact.

HealthcareProviderId.description: Healthcare provider that this award is associated                                  with.

Identifi.description: Issuing organization's identifier for the award                                  recipient.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastRefe.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this                                  record.

LastView.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this                                  record.

Name.description: Award name.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

Status.description: Award status. Example values:                                       Inactive                                       Revoked                                       Draft                                       Verified

UserId.description: ID of the person who received the award and is listed as                                  a user.

Verifica.description: Current award status. Example values:                                       Authorized                                       Pending                                       Unverified

Verified.description: Award was validated on this date.

Banker.name: Banker
Banker.description: Represents a business unit member who is assigned the banker role for a branch       unit.

CurrentBranchId.description: The ID of the branch associated with this banker's current work.

CurrentBranchStartTime.description: The date and time when this banker made this branch assignment current.

Description.description: Information about the assignment of this person to the banker role.

JobCode.description: An identifier that relates the banker to an externial system.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

Level.description: Specifies the organizational level of the banker.

Name.description: The name of this assignment of a banker to a branch.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ServiceResourceId.description: The ID of a service resource that lets this user be assigned to service            territories.

UserOrContactId.description: The contact or user associated with the banker.

BranchUnit.name: BranchUnit
BranchUnit.description: Represents details about a branch of an organization.

AccountId.description: The ID of an account that contains additional information about a branch.            The value must be unique within this organization.

BranchCode.description: An identifier that relates this branch to an external system.

BranchManagerId.description: The ID of a user who is the manager or main point of contact for the            branch unit.

EndDate.description: The date the branch most recently stopped being active.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the branch is currently active and can be used for            banker assignments and automatic associations.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The ID of a location where the branch does business.

OperatingHoursId.description: The ID of an operating hours record that specifies the hours when the            branch is open for normal business operations.

OperationalState.description: Specifies the operational readiness of a branch.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentBranchUnitId.description: The ID of this branch's parent branch unit, if it has one.

In Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set to the                             namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it, unless an object is in an                             installed managed package. CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the                       currency ISO code associated with the record.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external reference number associated with the comission                       statement line item.

FailureMessage.description: The failure message when processing fails for the commission                       statement line item.

InsurancePolicyEffectiveDate.description: The effective date of the insurance policy that's specified in the                       commission statement.

InsurancePolicyExpirationDate.description: The date until when the insurance policy remains effective.

InsurancePolicyNumber.description: The insurance policy number specified in the commission                       statement.

InsurancePolicyRenewalDate.description: The renewal date of the insurance policy that's specified in the                       commission statement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LineOfBusiness.description: Specifies the line of business for the commission statement line                       item.

LineOfCoverage.description: Specifies the coverage type for the commission statement line                       item.

Name.description: The name of the commission statement line item.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the commission statement line item.

TransactionDate.description: The date on which the transaction that generated the commission                       has occurred.

TransactionType.description: Specifies the transaction type of the commission statement line                       item.

ContextMappingConfig.name: ContextMappingConfig
ContextMappingConfig.description: Represents the context mapping configurations for business process          types.

ContextDefinition.description: The context definition that's associated with the context mapping                       configuration.

ContextMapping.description: The context mapping that's associated with the context mapping                       configuration.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the claim context mapping is active (true) or                       not (false) in relation to the associated Context Mapping                       Configuration record.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type that's associated with the context                       mapping configuration.

ContractGroupPlan.name: ContractGroupPlan
ContractGroupPlan.description: Represents a set of plans as part of the contract between the insurance carrier and the group. This set of plans corresponds to the plans included in the quote (as Quote Line Items). Child object of Contract.

AccountId.description: The group account associated with the contract group plan.

ContractGroupParentPlanId.description: The contract group parent plan associated with the contract group                       plan.

ContractId.description: The contract associated with the contract group plan.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The effective end date of the plan line item.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The effective start date of the plan line item.

EligibilityCriteria.description: The eligibility criteria for the contract group plan.

EnrollmentEndDate.description: The date when enrollment ends for the plans in the contract.

EnrollmentStartDate.description: The date when enrollment starts for the plans in the insurance                       contract.

EnrollmentWaitingPeriod.description: The waiting period in days after joining date before enrollment                       can begin.

GroupNumber.description: The group number associated with the group account. Required for                       the enrollment process.

IsOptional.description: Indicates whether the coverage product plan is optional (true) or                       mandatory (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view.

Name.description: The name of the contract group plan.

OriginalContractPlanId.description: The original contract plan associated with the contract group                       plan.

PlanType.description: Specifies the category for each contract plan.

PricingStructure.description: The structure of pricing based on the rate band tiers.

ProductNumber.description: The product number associated with a contract group plan.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote line item associated with the contract group plan.

Status.description: The status of the group contract plan.

UnitPrice.description: The price of the contract group plan.

UsageType.description: Internal field. Specifies the application using the group census                       to populate data. For example, Insurance or Loyalty.

ContractGroupPlanGroupClass.name: ContractGroupPlanGroupClass
ContractGroupPlanGroupClass.description: Represents the association of a Contract Group Plan to a Group Class. Use this entity to define group classes and group class contributions at the contract group plan level.

ContractGroupPlanId.description: The Contract Group Plan associated with the Contract Group Plan Group Class.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

GroupClassId.description: The Group Class associated with the Contract Group Plan Group Class.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the contract group plan group class.

OwnerId.description: The Owner associated with the Contract Group Plan Group Class.

ContractGrpPlanGrpClsAttr.name: ContractGrpPlanGrpClsAttr
ContractGrpPlanGrpClsAttr.description: Represents a view of the attributes selected for each contract group plan          group class.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The attribute definition associated with the contract group plan                       group class attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name of the attribute in the contract group plan group                       class.

AttributePicklistValueId.description: An attribute associated with the contract group plan group class                       when the attribute is of type Picklist.

ContractGroupPlanGroupClassId.description: The parent contract group plan group class that's associated with                       the contract group plan group class attribute.

ExternalId.description: The Id of the attribute in a contract group plan group class.

Value.description: The value of an attribute in the contract group plan group                       class.

CoverageType.name: CoverageType
CoverageType.description: Represents the type of coverage, such as liability, earthquake, or collision damage. You see this object only if you have enabled the Access Master List of Coverage Types org pref.

BenefitPaymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payment if the benefit or coverage entails a recurring payout to the insured.

Category.description: The category that the coverage belongs to. For example, benefit, clause, deductible, rider.

CategoryCode.description: A carrier-specific code that identifies the coverage. For example, benefit, clause, or deductible.

CategoryGroup.description: The specific category group. For example, for a liability coverage record, benefit is the category and liability is the category group.

CategoryGroupType.description: The type of the category group.

CategoryGroupTypeValue.description: Identifies the coverage limit type. For example, for a liability coverage of USD 1000 per person and USD 1500 per occurrence, Amount per Person and Amount per Occurrence are the category group type values.

CoverageCode.description: A carrier-specific code that identifies the policy limit code in the source system.

DeathBenefitOptionType.description: The method for the payment of death benefit.

DeductibleAmount.description: The deductible amount that the customer must pay.

Description.description: The description of the coverage type.

Discount.description: The discount that was given on the coverage or the benefit.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which the coverage is in effect.

ExpirationDate.description: The date on which the coverage expires.

IncomeOptionType.description: The type of the income option given to the policy participant. For example, periodic payment is an income option type, and annuity is an income option.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LimitAmount.description: The limit of the fixed coverage amount. For example, uninsured motorist coverage of USD 1000.

LimitDate.description: The date from which the coverage limit is in effect. For example, an annuity benefit is valid only after the insured is 60 years old.

LimitPercentage.description: The percentage of the actuals covered by this coverage.

LimitRange.description: The range of the coverage limit. For example, bodily injury coverage with limits as USD 100,000 per person and USD 300,000 per accident.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium paid by the customer for this coverage.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this coverage record in the source system.

CustomerProperty.name: CustomerProperty
CustomerProperty.description: Represents the insurable and insured properties of a customer.

AnnualMileage.description: The distance that the vehicle is expected to be driven in a year.

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset associated with this customer property.

BathroomCount.description: The total number of bathrooms in the property.

BedroomCount.description: The total number of bedrooms in the property.

BuiltUpArea.description: The property's usable area, which is also known as the carpet area.

CeilingType.description: The type of the ceiling the property has. For example, conventional, beam, shed, cove, tray, suspended.

ConstructionClass.description: The type of the property's construction. For example, framed, masonry non-combustible, modified, semi-resistive, or fire resistive.

DaysDrivenTowork.description: The number of days that the vehicle was used to drive to work.

Description.description: The description of the asset.

DwellingType.description: The property's dwelling type on the policy creation date. For example, ranch, single family, or condo.

EngineDisplacementVolume.description: The engine capacity of the vehicle.

FactoryPrice.description: The price of the vehicle billed by the manufacturer.

FairMarketValue.description: The estimated market price of the vehicle on the policy creation date.

FinancingType.description: The type of financing used to purchase the asset.

FloorCount.description: The number of stories in the property.

FloorType.description: The type of the floor the property had on the policy creation date. For example, ceramic tile, porcelain tile, floating wood tile.

FoundationType.description: The type of the property's foundation. For example, pier and beam, slab.

FuelType.description: The fuel system of the vehicle.

GarageSpaceCount.description: The number of parking spaces available in the property.

GarageType.description: The type of the garage the property has.

IsBasementIncluded.description: Indicates whether the property has a basement. The default value is False.

IsChimneyIncluded.description: Indicates whether the property has a chimney. The default value is False.

IsPassedSmogCheck.description: Indicates whether the vehicle has passed the smog check. The default value is False.

IsSwimmingPoolIncluded.description: Indicates whether the property has a swimming pool. The default value is False.

KitchenCount.description: The total number of kitchens in the property.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeasePeriod.description: The current lease period for the property.

LienHolderName.description: The bank or the financial firm that legally owns the asset.

LotArea.description: The total area of the plot on which the property is constructed, including the construction area and the open area on all sides.

MakeYear.description: The year in which the vehicle was manufactured.

MilesDrivenToWork.description: The number of miles that the vehicle covered when it was used to drive to work.

ModelName.description: The model name of the vehicle.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

OdometerReading.description: Vehicle's odometer reading on the policy creation date.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

PassengerSeatCapacity.description: The legal seating capacity of the vehicle.

PrimaryOwnerId.description: ID of the primary owner of the asset.

PrimaryUse.description: What the vehicle is primarily going to be used for.

PurchaseDate.description: The date on which this property was purchased.

PurchasePrice.description: The amount of money paid by the owner to purchase this property.

RegistrationType.description: Vehicle's registration type. For example, antique, combo, apportioned, commercial.

RoofType.description: The type of the roof the property has.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this property record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this property record in the source system.

TransmissionType.description: The transmission type of the vehicle.

YearBuilt.description: The year in which the property was constructed.

CustomObjectParticipant.name: CustomObjectParticipant
CustomObjectParticipant.description: Represents information about a participant in the context of a custom object          record.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

ParticipantId.description: The user or group associated with this participant.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The role associated with the participant.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The parent custom object record that's related to this participant                       record.

Deviation.name: Deviation
Deviation.description: Represents the information about the deviation from set rules.

ApprovalStatus.description: Specifies the approval status of the deviation.

Code.description: The unique code for the deviation.

Description.description: The description about the deviation.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the deviation is active (true) or (not).

IsApprovalRequired.description: Indicates whether an approval is required (true) or not (false)                       for the deviation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MinimumApproverLevel.description: Specifies the minimum level of the approver who can approve the                       deviation.

Name.description: The name of the deviation record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

Type.description: Specifies the type of deviation.

Dispute.name: Dispute
Dispute.description: Represents the details of a dispute that involves one or multiple disputed          transactions.

AccountId.description: The Person Account associated with the dispute.

ActualAmount.description: The total amount of all associated transactions.

ApprovedAmount.description: The amount that's approved to be credited to the customer.

AssessmentId.description: The Assessment associated with the dispute.

CaseId.description: The Case associated with the dispute. This is the related case to                       track the lifecycle of the dispute.

Description.description: The description of the dispute.

DisputedAmount.description: The total amount claimed in the dispute.

IsCardCancellationRequested.description: Indicates whether card cancellation was requested (true) or not                       (false).

IsCardReissueRequested.description: Indicates whether card reissue was requested (true) or not                       (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Dispute record

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ReceivedDate.description: The date when the dispute was reported to the bank.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the disputed transaction.

DisputeItem.name: DisputeItem
DisputeItem.description: Represents a transaction that’s being disputed.

AcquirerReferenceNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned to a transaction by the payment                       network if the transaction was done through a payment gateway.                       Available in version 61.0 and later.

ApprovedProvisionalCredit.description: The provisional credit amount that's approved for the dispute.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

CardBrand.description: Specifies the brand or network associated with the card that was                       used in the disputed transaction.

CardLastFourDigit.description: The last four digits of the credit or debit card number that's                       associated with this transaction. These digits are commonly used to                       verify the transaction and identify the cardholder. Available in                       version 60.0 and later.

CardSixDigitBin.description: The first six digits of the credit or debit card number that's                       associated with this transaction. These digits are used to identify                       the card issuer. Available in version 60.0 and later.

CardType.description: Specifies the type of card used in the transaction. Available in                       version 61.0 and later.

CaseClaimIdentifier.description: A unique identifier of the claim associated with an arbitration or                       compliance case . Available in version 62.0 and later.

ClaimIdentifier.description: A unique identifier of the claim associated with the chargeback.                       Available in version 61.0 and later.

ClearingMerchantName.description: The name of the merchant or business that accepted the payment                       through a card transaction. Available in version 61.0 and                       later.

ClearingTrxnAmountLocal.description: The cleared amount of the disputed transaction in the local                       currency.. Available in version 62.0 and later.

ClearingTrxnAmountLocalCrcy.description: The cleared amount of the disputed transaction in the local                       currency. Available in version 62.0 and later.

DisputeId.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

DisputeReasonId.description: The Dispute Reason associated with the dispute item. Available in                       version 61.0 and later.

DisputedAmount.description: The amount in the transaction that's under question or                       dispute.

EnrichmentProvider.description: Specifies the name of the enrichment provider that provides                       additional information associated with the transaction, such as                       merchant name, address, description, and URL. Available in version                       60.0 and later.

FundFlowDirection.description: Specifies the direction of funds in the transaction that's being                       disputed. Available in version 60.0 and later.

IsCardPresent.description: Indicates whether the payment card was present with the cardholder                       (true) or not (false) during the transaction. Available in version                       61.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MerchantAddress.description: The address of the merchant associated with the transaction.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

MerchantCategory.description: The category associated with the merchant based on the type of                       products or services the merchant provides. Available in version                       60.0 and later.

MerchantDescription.description: The description of the merchant associated with the transaction.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

MerchantName.description: The name of the merchant associated with the transaction.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

MerchantUrl.description: The website URL of the merchant associated with the transaction.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

MerchantLogoUrl.description: The logo URL of the merchant associated with the transaction.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

Name.description: Name of the DisputeItem record.

PaymentNetwork.description: Specifies the payment network that faciliates the exchange of                       funds between parties involved. Available in version 61.0 and                       later.

ProvisionalCreditApproverId.description: The User associated with the Dispute. The user is the approver of                       provisional credit amount. Available in version 60.0 and                       later.

ProvisionalCreditDate.description: The date when the provisional credit amount was credited.                       Available in version 60.0 and later.

ProvisionalCreditStatus.description: Specifies the status of the provisional credit amount. Available                       in version 60.0 and later.

ReceiverBin.description: The unique identifier of the entity who filed an arbitration or                       compliance case. Available in version 62.0 and later.

SenderBin.description: The unique identifier of the entity against which an arbitration                       or compliance case is filed. Available in version 62.0 and                       later.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the disputed transaction.

TransactionAmount.description: The total amount involved in the transaction.

TransactionCode.description: The unique code that identifies the type of transaction.

TransactionCurrencyCode.description: The unique code associated with the currency used in this                       transaction.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

TransactionsApiSearchResult.description: The search result of the transactions API. Available in version                       61.0 and later.

TrxnApiAuthorizationResult.description: The authorization information obtained from the transactions API.                       Available in version 61.0 and later.

TrxnApiClrAndStlResult.description: The clearing and settlement information obtained from the                       transactions API. Available in version 61.0 and later.

TrxnAuthorizationIdentifier.description: The unique identifier generated during the authorization phase of                       a transaction to verify the availability of sufficient funds in the                       cardholder's account to proceed with the transaction. Available in                       version 61.0 and later.

TrxnClearingIdentifier.description: The unique identifier assigned to a transaction during clearing                       and settlement process to track the transaction's progress and                       facilitate funds transfer between parties. Available in version                       61.0 and later.

ValidationOutcome.description: Specifies the outcome of the validation rules run on the disputed                       transaction.

ValidationOutcomeReason.description: The reason for the transaction's validation outcome. Available in                       version 60.0 and later.

DisputeItemArbitration.name: DisputeItemArbitration
DisputeItemArbitration.description: Represents the details of the arbitration or compliance case filed for a transaction that's being disputed.

Amount.description: The amount that's claimed by a party in a disputed                       transaction.

Description.description: The description of the arbitration or compliance case.

DisputeItemId.description: The Dispute Item asscoiated with an arbitration or compliance                       case.

DisputeReasonId.description: The Dispute Reason associated with the disputed transaction for                       which an arbitration or compliance case is filed.

DocumentUploadStatus.description: Specifies the upload status of the document or an image related to                       the arbitration or compliance case.

ExternalCaseIdentifier.description: The uniqie identifier of the arbitration or compliance case                       assigned to a disputed transaction by a dispute management system,                       such as Mastercom or Visa.

IsEscalated.description: Indicates if the pre-arbitration case was escalated (true) or not                       (false) to create an arbitration case.

IsReasonCodeUpdated.description: Indicates if the reason code for the disputed transaction was                       updated (true) or not (fasle) before filing the arbitration or                       compliance case.

Memo.description: The memo content of the arbitration or compliance case.

ReasonCodeUpdateReason.description: The description for the reason code update.

Role.description: Specifies the role under which an entity filed the arbitration or                       compliance case.

Status.description: The status of the arbitration or compliance case retrieved from a                       dispute management system.

Type.description: Specifies the type of case filed for the transaction that's being                       disputed.

DisputeItemChargeback.name: DisputeItemChargeback
DisputeItemChargeback.description: Represents the claim and chargeback created by the card issuer for a          transaction that's being disputed.

ChargebackAmount.description: The total amount claimed by the issuer using a chargeback for the                       disputed transaction. Available in version 62.0 and later.

ChargebackAmountCurrency.description: The currency in which the chargeback amount is credited to the                       cardholder. Available in version 62.0 and later.

ChargebackCreatedData.description: TThe date when the chargeback was created for a disputed                       transaction. Available in version 62.0 and later.

ChargebackIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the chargeback assigned by the dispute                       system.

ChargebackReferenceNumber.description: A unique reference number that's associated with the chargeback                       process, enabling the issuer to track the chargeback throughout its                       lifecycle, including pre-arbitration case.

Description.description: The description of the chargeback request provided by the member                       or the entity filing the chargeback.

DisputeItemId.description: The Dispute Item associated with the chargeback.

DisputeReasonId.description: The dispute reason associated with the chargeback.

DocumentStatus.description: The status of a document associated with the chargeback.

IsDocumentRequired.description: Indicates whether a supporting document is required (true) or not                       (false) for dispute resolution.

IsPartialChargeback.description: Indicates whether the cardholder has disputed only a portion of                       the transaction amount (true) or not (false).

IsRefundReceived.description: Indicates whether the cardholder received the expected refund                       (true) or not (false) for the chargeback.

RejectReason.description: The reason for rejecting the chargeback by the dispute                       system.

Status.description: Specifies the status of chargeback.

StatusUpdateDateTime.description: The date and time when the chargeback status was last updated. The                       timestamp is represented in the ISO 8601 format.

TransactionSettlementDate.description: The date when the transaction was completed and the funds were                       transferred between the parties involved.

Type.description: Specifies the type of chargeback based on the dispute reason.

DisputeItemMerchantAlert.name: DisputeItemMerchantAlert
DisputeItemMerchantAlert.description: Represents the alert sent by the card issuer to the merchant. The alert          occurs through a chargeback prevention vendor like Ethoca Merchant Alerts™ for a          transaction that’s being disputed.

AlertDeliveryStatus.description: Specifies the delivery status of the alert associated with an                       individual transaction in a batch of disputed transactions.

AlertDlvrStatusDescription.description: The description of the delivery status of the alert.

AlertIdentifier.description: A unique identifier assigned to a merchant alert related to the                       transaction that's being disputed. The alert identifier is                       generated by a chargeback prevention system like Ethoca.

DisputeItemId.description: The Dispute Item associated with the merchant alert.

DisputedTrxnBatchIdentifier.description: An unique identifier assigned to the request made by the issuer                       for submitting a group of disputed transactions. Each group of                       disputed transactions is called a batch. The batch identifier is                       generated by a chargeback prevention system like Ethoca.

DisputedTrxnBatchStatus.description: Specifies the status of the batch of disputed transactions that                       includes this transaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the DisputeItem record.

Outcome.description: Specifies the outcome of the alert selected by the merchant.

OutcomeDescription.description: The description of the alert outcome.

OutcomeUpdateDateTime.description: The date and time when the merchant last updated the alert outcome                       of the transaction that's being disputed. The timestamp is                       represented in the ISO 8601 format.

RefundStatus.description: Specifies the status of the refund issued by the merchant in                       response to the customer's dispute alert.

Source.description: Specifies the source of the merchant alert.

Type.description: Specifies the type of alert associated with the transaction that's                       being disputed.

DisputeItemQueueResponse.name: DisputeItemQueueResponse
DisputeItemQueueResponse.description: Represents the response received from the job that’s run to fetch the claim          details.

DisputeItemId.description: The Dispute Item that's associated with the queue response.

DisputeQueueJobRunId.description: The Dispute Queue Job Run that's associated with the dispute item                       queue response.

QueueName.description: The name of the queue that's the source of the response.

QueueResponse.description: The dispute item claim details received from a queue.

ResponseProcessingStatus.description: Indicates whether the update received for a claim from the queue                       is processed (true) or not (false).

DisputeQueueJobRun.name: DisputeQueueJobRun
DisputeQueueJobRun.description: Represents a job that’s run to fetch the details of the claims.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time until when the job ran.

FlowInterviewId.description: The Flow Interview that's associated with the dispute queue job                       run.

JobRunInformation.description: The information about the job run, such as status, error message,                       and so on.

QueueName.description: Specifies the name of the queue from where the claims are                       retrieved.

RetrievedClaimCount.description: The number of claims that were retrieved in the job.

RetrievedPageCount.description: The number of pages that were retrieved in the job.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the job.

DisputeReason.name: DisputeReason
DisputeReason.description: Represents the reason for the transaction dispute.

CardType.description: Specifies the type of card used in the transaction that's being                       disputed.

Description.description: The description of the reason.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether a reason code is active (true) or not                       (false).

IsDocumentRequired.description: Indicates whether supporting document is required (true) or not                       (false) for the reason code.

PaymentNetwork.description: Specifies the payment network that faciliates the exchange of                       funds between parties involved.

ReasonCode.description: Specifies a unique code that identifies the primary reason for a                       disputed transaction.

ReasonCodeName.description: The name associated with a reason code.

ReasonCodeSubtype.description: Specifies the subtype of the reason code.

ReasonCodeType.description: Specifies the type of the reason code.

ReasonCodeValidFromDate.description: The start date of the validity of the reason code.

ReasonCodeValidToDate.description: The end date of the validity of the reason code.

ReasonSubcode.description: Specifies a unique subcode that classifies a disputed transaction                       within a specific reason code.

ReasonSubcodeName.description: The name associated with a reason subcode.

DistributorAuthorization.name: DistributorAuthorization
DistributorAuthorization.description: Represents the official authorization from an insurance company granting a       distributor the permission to act as its agent.

AccountId.description: The ID of the distributor’s business account.

AuthorizedInsuranceLineI.description: The insurance line that the insurance company is authorized to sell.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact associated with the producer.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which this authorization is in effect.

ExpirationDate.description: The date on which this authorization expires.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the authorization is active (true) or inactive (false).            The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to            this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LicenseId.description: The distributor’s business license against which the distributor is            authorized.

Name.description: An auto-number identifier for this distributor authorization.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

Status.description: The authorization status of the distributor.

TerminationCause.description: The reason for the termination of the distributor’s authorization.

DocChkItemValidatedTarget.name: DocChkItemValidatedTarget
DocChkItemValidatedTarget.description: Represents the details of the document checklist item and the target object          against which the document checklist item was validated.

DocumentChecklistItemId.description: The document checklist item against which a target reference                       object is validated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the validation of the target reference object is                       active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Document Checklist Item Validated Target                       record.

TargetReferenceObjectId.description: The object validated against a document checklist item.

DocumentCategory.name: DocumentCategory
DocumentCategory.description: Represents a document category that's used to group the document checklist          items.

Description.description: The description for the document category.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the document category.

Language.description: The language of the document category.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the document category.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer                       Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters.
