You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the                       namespacePrefix__componentName notation.The namespace prefix can                          have one of the following values:                           In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is                             set to the namespace prefix of the organization for all                             objects that support it. There’s an exception if an object is                             in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has                             the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This                             field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer                             Edition organization of the package developer.                           In organizations that are Developer Edition organizations,                             NamespacePrefix is only set for objects that are part of an                             installed managed package. There’s no namespace prefix for                             all other objects.

DocumentCategoryDocumentType.name: DocumentCategoryDocumentType
DocumentCategoryDocumentType.description: Represents a junction between Document Category and Document Type.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain                       only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in                       your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end                       with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In                       managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package                       installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s                       name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a                       subscriber’s organization.   Note When creating large sets of data,                          always specify a unique DeveloperName for each record. If no                          DeveloperName is specified, performance slows down while                          Salesforce generates one for each record.

DocumentCategoryId.description: The Document Category associated with this record.

DocumentTypeId.description: The Document Type associated with this record

Language.description: The language of the document category.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the picklist value that appears in the UI.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer                       Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the                       namespacePrefix__componentName notation.The namespace prefix can                          have one of the following values:                           In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is                             set to the namespace prefix of the organization for all                             objects that support it. There’s an exception if an object is                             in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has                             the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This                             field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer                             Edition organization of the package developer.                           In organizations that are Developer Edition organizations,                             NamespacePrefix is only set for objects that are part of an                             installed managed package. There’s no namespace prefix for                             all other objects.

DocumentChecklistItem.name: DocumentChecklistItem
DocumentChecklistItem.description: Represents a checklist item for a file documentation upload.

AccountId.description: Read only. The ID of the account the document checklist item belongs to. The            value of the field is set internally using the ParentRecordId field.

Comments.description: Comments added when validating a target reference object against the            document checklist item. This field is available only if you have enabled            Integrated Onboarding for Financial Services Cloud.

DocumentCategoryId.description: The document category related to the document checklist item. This field is            available only if you have enabled Integrated Onboarding for Financial            Services Cloud.

DocumentTypeId.description: ID of the document type for the document checklist item.

Instruction.description: Instructions associated with the document checklist item.

IsAccepted.description: Indicates whether the file has been accepted. The default value is            False.

IsFrozen.description: Indicates that the item can no longer be modified. The default value is            False.

IsRequired.description: Indicates if the document checklist item is required. The default value is            False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the document checklist item.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentRecordId.description: Original parent object the document checklist item belonged            to.

Status.description: Uploaded document checklist item status.

ValidatedById.description: The user who validated the target reference object against the document            checklist item. This field is available only if you have enabled Integrated            Onboarding for Financial Services Cloud.

ValidationDateTime.description: The date and time when the target reference object was validated. This field            is available only if you have enabled Integrated Onboarding for Financial            Services Cloud.

properties.description: Person that the uploaded documentation pertains to.

DocumentType.name: DocumentType
DocumentType.description: Represents the type of file being uploaded or attached.

Description.description: The description for the document category.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name  can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your  org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and  not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming  conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s  name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s  organization.  Note When creating large sets of data, always specify a  unique DeveloperName for each record. If no   DeveloperName is specified, performance slows down while  Salesforce generates one for each record.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the document type in an external system. This            field is available only if you have enabled Integrated Onboarding for            Financial Services Cloud.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the document type is active.

Language.description: The language of the document type.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the picklist value that appears in the UI.

MaximumFileSize.description: Specifies the maximum file size in MB for each document checklist item. This            field is available only if you have enabled Integrated Onboarding for            Financial Services Cloud.

MaximumFileUploadCount.description: Specifies the maximum number of file uploads allowed for a document            category. This field is available only if you have enabled Integrated            Onboarding for Financial Services Cloud.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition            organization that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.            Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by            using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.The namespace prefix can              have one of the following values:               In Developer Edition organizations, the namespace prefix is set to the                namespace prefix of the organization for all objects that support it.                There’s an exception if an object is in an installed managed package. In                that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed                package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer                Edition organization of the package developer.               In organizations that are Developer Edition organizations,                NamespacePrefix is only set for objects that are part of an installed                managed package. There’s no namespace prefix for all other objects.

FinancialDeal.name: FinancialDeal
FinancialDeal.description: Represents the deal that the financial institution is working on.

AccountId.description: The account ID of the customer who engaged the financial institution in this deal.

CloseProbability.description: The probability of the deal being successfully closed.

ConfidentialityType.description: Specifies the level of confidentiality of the information that's recorded in the financial deal.

ConflictStatus.description: Specifies the status of the conflict clearance for the financial deal.

Description.description: The description of the deal.

ExpectedCloseDate.description: The date when the deal is expected to close.

FinancialDealCode.description: A unique code that identifies the deal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MandatedDate.description: The date when the financial deal was mandated.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ReceivedFee.description: The total fee received by the financial institution until the current date.

Role.description: The role that the financial institution plays in this deal.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the deal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the deal.

TotalExpectedFee.description: The total fee expected by the financial institution until the current date.

TotalExpense.description: The total expense incurred for the financial deal until the current date.

TransactionValue.description: The total transaction value of the financial deal.

FinancialDealAsset.name: FinancialDealAsset
FinancialDealAsset.description: Represents the assets included in the financial deal.

AssetId.description: The asset involved in the financial deal.

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal associated with the financial deal asset                       record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal asset record.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the asset.

FinancialDealBid.name: FinancialDealBid
FinancialDealBid.description: Represents the bids placed by financial deal parties in the financial          deal.

BidAmount.description: The amount that the financial deal party is willing to pay for the                       bid.

BidDate.description: The date on which the bid has been placed by the financial deal                       party.

BidRound.description: The bidding round in which the bid has been placed by the                       financial deal party.

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal associated with the financial deal bid                       record.

FinancialDealPartyId.description: The financial deal party who's making the bid.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal bid record.

FinancialDealInteraction.name: FinancialDealInteraction
FinancialDealInteraction.description: Represents a junction between an interaction and a financial deal.

Comment.description: Notes about the financial deal associated with the                       interaction.

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal associated with the interaction.

InteractionId.description: The interaction associated with the financial deal interaction                       record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal interaction record.

FinancialDealParticipant.name: FinancialDealParticipant
FinancialDealParticipant.description: Represents the user or the group with whom the deal is shared.

FinancialDealId.description: The deal that's shared with the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the deal participant is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

ParticipantId.description: The user or group that the deal is shared with.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The role assigned to the participant.

FinancialDealParty.name: FinancialDealParty
FinancialDealParty.description: Represents the parties, such as partners and competitors, that are involved in the deal.

ContactId.description: The contact ID of the party.

FinancialDealId.description: The deal that's shared with the participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastStageChangeDate.description: The date of the last change made to the Stage field on this financial deal party record. This field is available in API version 54.0.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the party that's involved in the deal.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

PartyId.description: The account ID of the party.

PartyRole.description: The party's role in the deal.

Stage.description: The current stage of the party involved with the financial deal.

FinancialDealProduct.name: FinancialDealProduct
FinancialDealProduct.description: Represents the products (services) offered by the bank in the deal.

Fee.description: The fee charged by the bank for the product

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal that the product or service is associated with.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product (service) provided by the bank.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ProductId.description: The product (service) provided by the bank in the deal.

FinancialGoal.name: FinancialGoal
FinancialGoal.description: This Financial Goal object is a standard Salesforce object. It represents a          financial goal for a person account.

ActualAmount.description: The current amount saved toward the goal.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the goal. This field is available in API                       version 60.0 and later.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the financial goal is reached.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the                       record.

Description.description: The description of the financial goal.

EstimatedSuccessPercent.description: The estimated success percentage of the financial goal. This field                       is available in API version 60.0 and later.

FinancialPlanId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

InitialAmount.description: The initial amount saved toward the goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the financial goal.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the goal.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the financial goal in an external                       system.

StartDate.description: The start date of the financial goal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the financial goal.

TargetAmount.description: The amount required to reach the goal.

TargetDate.description: The date when the financial goal is expected to be reached.

Type.description: Specifies the type of financial goal.

WithdrawalFrequency.description: The frequency at which the money is withdrawn. This field is                       available in API version 60.0 and later.

FinancialGoalFunding.name: FinancialGoalFunding
FinancialGoalFunding.description: The financial goal of an individual or person account that requires          funding.

Amount.description: The amount contributed to the financial goal.

FinancialGoalId.description: The financial goal of an individual or person account that                       requires funding.

Name.description: The name of the record.

FinancialGoalParty.name: FinancialGoalParty
FinancialGoalParty.description: Represents a junction between the financial goal and the person account.

AccountId.description: The account to which the financial goal party is associated.

FinancialGoalId.description: The financial goal to which the financial goal party is                       associated.

Name.description: The name of the financial goal party.

FinancialPlan.name: FinancialPlan
FinancialPlan.description: Represents a financial plan for a person account.

AccountId.description: The household to which the financial plan is associated.

Description.description: The description of the financial plan.

EstimatedSuccessPercent.description: The success percentage that's estimated for the financial                       plan.

Name.description: The name of the financial plan.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the financial plan in an external                       system.

StartDate.description: The start date of the financial plan.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the finanical plan.

Type.description: Specifies the type of financial plan.

FinAssetPortfolioTgtAlloc.name: FinAssetPortfolioTgtAlloc
FinAssetPortfolioTgtAlloc.description: Stores target asset allocation for a financial account, person account, or          household.

ActualAmount.description: Represents the actual amount of all assets.

ActualLastUpdated.description: Represents the last updated time of the Actual Percent.

ActualPercent.description: Represents the actual allocation percentage of all assets.

AssetClass.description: Defines the major category of the asset type.

AssetSubclass.description: Defines the subclass of the asset class.

Description.description: Describes the asset allocation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the asset portfolio target allocation.

NegativeTolerance.description: Represents the allowed amount the actual allocation can be below                       the target, by rule.

PositiveTolerance.description: Represents the allowed amount the actual allocation can be above                       the target, by rule.

Sector.description: Represents a group of stocks that have a lot in common.

TargetId.description: Associates the target object with the asset allocation.

TargetPercent.description: Represents the target allocation for the asset classification                       category.

VarianceAmount.description: Represents the difference between the Target and Actual                       Amount.

VariancePercent.description: Represents the difference between the Target Percent and Actual                       Percent.

FinclDealInteractionSummary.name: FinclDealInteractionSummary
FinclDealInteractionSummary.description: Represents a junction between an interaction summary and a financial          deal.

Comment.description: Notes about the financial deal associated with the interaction                       summary.

FinancialDealId.description: The financial deal associated with the interaction summary.

InteractionSummaryId.description: The interaction summary associated with the financial deal                       interaction summary record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the financial deal interaction summary record.

FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fi.name: FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fields
FinServ AccountContactRelation Custom Fi.description: Represents the relationship between an individual (specifically the             contact part of the individual) and the household (account) that the individual is a             member of. AccountContactRelation is a standard object that is available through the             Shared Contacts feature. Custom fields extend the AccountContactRelation standard object             for use in Financial Services Cloud.

DecisionMakingAuthorityType.description: Specifies the type of the decision-making                                  authority.

DeclarationType.description: Specifies the formal manner or approach used to                                  officially state the stakeholder's role or position.

IsDecisionMakingAuthority.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a decision-making                                  authority (true) or not (false).

IncludeInGroup__c.description: Includes this account in a related individual's primary                                  group.

IsShareholder.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a shareholder                                  (true) or not (false).

Primary__c.description: Indicates the primary member of a group (true) or not (false).

PrimaryGroup__c.description: Indicates a person's primary group. You can roll up                                  summary fields only to a person’s primary group if                                      PrimaryGroup__c                                  is set to true.

Rollups__c.description: Records associated with the individual that are included                                  in household roll-up summaries. Valid values:                                      All                                       Tasks                                       Events                                       Financial Accounts                                       Assets and Liabilities                                       Financial Goals

ShareholderHierarchyLevel.description: Specifies the hierarchical level between the account and                                  the intermediate shareholder. The shareholder hierarchy                                  level is applicable only to an intermediate share                                  holder.

ShareholderType.description: Specifies the type of the shareholder.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship between the applicant and                                  the related applicant started.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the individual in an                                  external data source.

TotalSharePercent.description: The total percentage of shares owned by the stakeholder,                                  combining both direct and indirect ownership.

FinServ AuthorizationForm Custom Fields.name: FinServ AuthorizationForm Custom Fields
FinServ AuthorizationForm Custom Fields.description: Represents the specific version and effective dates of a form that is          associated with consent, such as a privacy policy or terms and conditions.

AssociatedRegulation__c.description: The specific regulation to which this authorization form is                       related.

ConsentDurationDayCount__c.description: Represents the number of days for which this Authorization Form is                       valid for, upon providing consent.

FinServ AuthorizationFormConsent Custom.name: FinServ AuthorizationFormConsent Custom Fields
FinServ AuthorizationFormConsent Custom.description: Represents the date and way in which a user consented to an          authorization form.

Browser__c.description: Collects data at the time of consent from the browser of the                       person providing consent.

ConsentExpirationDateTime__c.description: Specifies the length of time for which this particular consent, if                       accepted, lasts. This is a formula field that adds the Consent                       Captured Date time and Consent Duration Days on the Auth Form                       entity.

Email__c.description: Collects data at the time of consent from the email address of the                       person providing consent.

InfoAuthRequestFormId__c.description: Identification of the Information Authorization Request Form                       related to this record.

IP__c.description: Collects data at the time of consent from the IP address of the                       person providing consent.

Location__c.description: Collects data at the time of consent from the geo location of the                       person providing consent.

FinServ AuthorizationFormText Custom Fie.name: FinServ AuthorizationFormText Custom Fields
FinServ AuthorizationFormText Custom Fie.description: Represents an authorization form’s text and language settings.

IsActive__c.description: There can only be one Active Authorization Form Text at any given                       time with an Auth Form and locale combination. When a Consent                       Request is sent on a Data Use Purpose, all of the active                       authorization forms associated with the Data Use Purpose are                       selected, and all of the active authorization form text on the                       authorization forms is served to the person providing consent.

IsReadOnly__c.description: The form is read only and not editable. When you make an                       Authorization Form Text active at any point, IsReadOnly must be                       permanently false.

LastActivationDateTime__c.description: You can sort the list of authorization texts based on their most                       recent activation date.

FinServ_AccountAccountRelation__c.name: FinServ_AccountAccountRelation__c
FinServ_AccountAccountRelation__c.description: Represents a relationship between two accounts, such as between a    household and a business account.

Account__c.description: Account that RelatedAccount__c is related from.

Active__c.description: Indicates whether the relationship is active (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

DeclarationType__c.description: Specifies the formal manner or approach used to officially state the stakeholder's role or position.

ExternalId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the relationship in an external data source.

InverseRelationship__c.description: Uniquely identifies the relationship between Account and  RelatedAccount__c so that it can be referenced by a trigger that creates the inverse relationship record.

IsShareholder__c.description: Indicates whether the stakeholder is a shareholder (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Auto-number identifier for the relationship. Label is Account Relation  Name.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the relationship record.

RelatedAccount__c.description: Account that Account__c is related to.

Role__c.description: Role that describes how RelatedAccount__c is related to  Account__c.

ShareholderHierarchyLevel__c.description: Specifies the hierarchical level between the account and the intermediate shareholder. The shareholder hierarchy level is applicable only to an intermediate share holder.

ShareholderType__c.description: Specifies the type of the shareholder.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the relationship in an external data source.

TotalSharePercent__c.description: The total percentage of shares owned by the stakeholder, combining both direct and indirect ownership.

FinServ_Alert__c.name: FinServ_Alert__c
FinServ_Alert__c.description: Represents notifications to alert advisors about their client          accounts.

Account__c.description: A lookup field to an account that alerts are related to.

Active__c.description: Indicates whether an alert is active.

FinancialAccount__c.description: The financial account that alerts are related to.

Message__c.description: The main content of an alert.

MessageDescription__c.description: An optional description for the main content of an alert as                       specified in the Message__c field. This text                       appears below the main content.

Priority__c.description: An indication of the urgency of an alert. Valid values:                          High                           Low                           Medium

Severity__c.description: The type of alert. Valid values:                          Error                           Info                           Warning

SourceSystemId__c.description: The ID of a record from the external system that triggered the                       alert.

FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c.name: FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c
FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c.description: Represents assets or liabilities that are not represented in a             client's financial accounts, such as real estate or collectibles.

Amount__c.description: Amount of an asset (positive) or liability                                  (negative).

AssetsAndLiabilitiesSource__c.description: Data source. Label is Source. Valid values:                                      Manual Entry                                       Yodlee

AssetsAndLiabilitiesType__c.description: Type of asset or liability. Label is                                      Type. Valid values:                                      Auto Loan                                       Mortgage                                       Other                                       Personal Loan                                       Real Estate                                       Equipment                                       Automobile                                       Collection                                       Gold                                       Jewelry                                       Cash

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the                                  record.

Description__c.description: Description of this asset or liability.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account that this asset or liability is                                  related to.

Household__c.description: Household that this asset or liability is associated                                  with.

JointOwner__c.description: Joint owner, if any, for this asset or liability.

LastRefe.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                                  related to this record.

LastView.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this                                  record.

Name.description: Name of this asset or liability.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the asset or liability                                  record.

Ownership__c.description: Type of ownership for this asset or liability. Valid values:                                      Individual                                       Joint                                       Trust

OwnerType__c.description: Client’s ownership role (primary or joint) for this                                  asset or liability. The value is specified by a                                  trigger.

PrimaryOwner__c.description: Primary owner of this asset or liability.

RecordTy.description: ID of the record type associated with this asset or                                  liability.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the asset or liability in an external data source.

FinServ_BillingStatement__c.name: FinServ_BillingStatement__c
FinServ_BillingStatement__c.description: Represents a billing statement for an individual’s financial          account.

CashAdvances__c.description: Cash advance amount for the billing period.

Deposits__c.description: Deposit made to the account during the billing period.

EndingBalance__c.description: Balance due on the account during the billing period.

FeesCharged__c.description: Fee charged during the billing period.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account associated with this billing statement.

InsurancePolicy__c.description: The insurance policy associated with the billing statement

InterestThisPeriod__c.description: Interest charged on the account during the billing period.

LastPaymentDate__c.description: Date of the last payment made on the account.

MinimumPaymentDue__c.description: Minimum payment required by the due date.

OtherCredits__c.description: Other credits made during the billing period.

PastDueAmount__c.description: Amount past due as of the statement date.

Payments__c.description: Payment received since the last statement.

PreviousBalance__c.description: Account balance at the end of the previous billing period.

Purchases__c.description: Total purchases made during the current billing period.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the individual in an external data                       source.

StatementDate__c.description: Date the current statement was generated.

Withdrawals__c.description: Cash withdrawal made during the billing period.

FinServ_Card__c.name: FinServ_Card__c
FinServ_Card__c.description: Represents credit or debit card associated with this financial          account.

AccountHolder__c.description: Individual                       credit or debit holder associated with this                       card.

Active__c.description: Indicates whether the account is active (true) or inactive (false). Default is true.

BinNumber__c.description: Bank                       Identification                       number                       for this account.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account associated with this card.

OwnershipType__c.description: Type of ownership for this card. Valid values:                          Primary                           Authorized                           Other

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the financial account in an external                       data source.

ValidUntil__c.description: Date card is no longer valid.

FinServ_ChargesAndFees__c.name: FinServ_ChargesAndFees__c
FinServ_ChargesAndFees__c.description: Represents agreed-to fees and charges for servicing an individual’s          financial account.

AnnualAccountCharge__c.description: Annual fee for maintaining an account.

AnnualMembershipFee__c.description: Annual fee for credit card membership.

APRType__c.description: Annual percentage rate type. Valid values:                          Fixed                           Other                           Variable

CashAdvanceFee__c.description: Fee for withdrawing cash from a credit card account.

CashAPR__c.description: Annual percentage rate applied to cash withdrawals.

CashAPRType__c.description: APR applied to cash borrowed from a credit card account. Valid values:                          Fixed                           Other                           Variable

ForeignTransactionFee__c.description: Fee for making a credit card purchase in a foreign currency.

InsufficientFundsFee__c.description: Fee for attempting to make a purchase or payment from an account                       with insufficient funds.

InterestRate__c.description: Interest rate on a loan account (APR%).

LatePaymentFee__c.description: Fee for not paying                       the                       minimum payment by                       the                       due date.

MaximumTransactionFee__c.description: Fee for exceeding                       the                       maximum monthly transaction limit.

OverdraftFees__c.description: Fee for a withdrawal that exceeds the available balance.

ReplacementCardFee__c.description: Fee for debit or credit card replacement.

ReturnedCheckFee__c.description: Fee for writing or receiving a check returned due to insufficient                       funds.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the individual in an external data                       source.

StatementFee__c.description: Fee for mailing an account statement.

StopPaymentFee__c.description: Fee for requesting a stop payment on a check or payment that                       hasn’t been processed yet.

FinServ_ContactContactRelation__c.name: FinServ_ContactContactRelation__c
FinServ_ContactContactRelation__c.description: Represents the relationship between any two         individuals.

Active__c.description: Indicates whether the relationship is active (true) or not (false). The default                                  value is true.

Contact__c.description: Contact that RelatedContact__c is                                  related from.

FinServ_FinancialAccount__c.name: FinServ_FinancialAccount__c
FinServ_FinancialAccount__c.description: Represents a financial account such as an investment account, bank    account, or insurance policy.

DailyWithdrawalLimit__c.description: Amount that can be withdrawn in one day.

InvestmentObjectives__c.description: Purpose of this financial account. Valid values:  Safety   Income   Growth   Tax Optimization   Liquidity

JointOwner__c.description: Joint owner of this financial account.

LastActivityDate.description: Timestamp for when this financial account last had a task or event action associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastTransactionDate.description: Timestamp for the last transaction on the account.

LastUpdated__c.description: Timestamp for when data for the financial account was last updated by an external data source.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

LienHolder__c.description: Name of lien holder on the financial account.

Managed__c.description: Indicates whether this financial account is managed or administered (true), or not (false).

MinimumBalance__c.description: Minimum balance requirement for this financial account.

ModelPortfolio__c.description: Model asset allocation for the financial account. Valid values:  Conservative   Moderate   Balanced   Growth   Aggressive

OpenDate__c.description: Date when the financial account was opened.

Ownership__c.description: Type of ownership for the account. Valid values:  Individual   Joint   Trust

OwnerType__c.description: Individual’s ownership role (primary or joint) for the account.

PaperlessDelivery__c.description: Account owner elects to receive electronic delivery of financial account documents  (true) or not (false).

PaymentDueDate__c.description: Date when payment due on the account.

PaymentFrequency__c.description: Frequency of payments on the account. Valid values:  Weekly   Biweekly   Monthly   Quarterly   Semiannually   Annually

Performance1Yr__c.description: Performance measured over the past year.

Performance3Yr__c.description: Performance measured over the past three years.

PerformanceMTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past month-to-date.

PerformanceQTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past quarter-to-date.

PerformanceYTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past calendar year-to-date.

PolicyTerm__c.description: The period of coverage provided by the policy.

PrimaryBankerName__c.description: The name of the primary banker who manages the financial account.

PrimaryOwner__c.description: Primary owner of the financial account.

PrincipalBalance__c.description: Principal balance on the loan account.

PrincipalPaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount paid against the principal in the current tax year.

PropTaxPaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount of property tax paid in the current tax year.

RebalanceFrequency__c.description: Frequency of portfolio rebalancing for this financial account. Valid values:  Monthly   Quarterly   Semiannually   Annually

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with this financial account.

RecordTypeName__c.description: Record type for this financial account. The value is copied from  RecordType.Name and can’t be changed. Label is Record  Type.

RenewalDate__c.description: Date when insurance policy renewal is due.

SecondaryBankerIdentifier__c.description: The unique identifier of the secondary banker who manages the financial account.

SecondaryBankerName__c.description: The name of the secondary banker who manages the financial account.

ServiceProvider__c.description: Custodian or recordkeeper of this financial account.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the financial account in an external data source.

StatementFrequency__c.description: Frequency statements are issued. Valid values:  Monthly   Biweekly   Quarterly   Annually

Status__c.description: Status of this financial account. Valid values:  Open   Closed   On Hold   Pending

TargetLimit__c.description: The limit on items or value that the service processes.

TaxStatus__c.description: Type of tax treatment this financial account qualifies for. Valid values:  Nonqualified   Qualified

TermDepositMaturityDate__c.description: The date a fixed term deposit matures.

TimeHorizon__c.description: Investment time frame for this financial account. Valid values:  Long Term   Medium Term   Short Term

TotalHoldAmountAsOfDate__c.description: The date the total hold amount is relevant.

TotalHoldAmount__c.description: The total hold amount on the financial account.

InsurancePolicy.description: Represents the type of insurance policy, such as auto, home, life, or       annuity.

AuditTerm.description: The frequency of the audit. For example, monthly, semi-monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

BillingCarrierAccountId.description: The name of the Billing Carrier Account associated with the Insurance Policy. When the company that sells the policy also writes the policy, then the billing carrier is the same as the writing carrier.

BillingType.description: Specifies the type of biling for the policy.

CancellationDate.description: The date the insurance policy was canceled.

CancellationReason.description: The reason for canceling the insurance policy.

CancellationReasonType.description: The category that the cancellation reason belongs to.

CashSurrenderValue.description: The cash surrender value of the insurance policy.

ChangeSubtype.description: A further categorization of the change type. For example, childbirth, marriage.

ChangeType.description: The type of the change in the policy. For example: life event, house renovation.

CommissionFrequency.description: The frequency of receiving commission from the carrier.

CommissionPercent.description: The percentage of policy premium to be earned as commission by the brokerage firm.

CurrentDueAmount.description: The current due amount for the policy.

DateRenewed.description: The date on which the policy was last renewed.

Discount.description: The discount that was given on the policy.

EffectiveDate.description: The date the policy is in effect.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the policy becomes effective.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date until when the policy remains effective.

ExpectedRevenueAmount.description: The revenue amount that the brokerage firm is expected to earn from the policy.

EmployeeContribution.description: The employee's contribution towards the insurance premium value.

EmployerContribution.description: The employer's contribution towards the insurance premium value.

FinalRenewalDate.description: The final date on which the policyholder can renew the insurance policy.

FundingType.description: Specifies how the policy is being funded.

GrossWrittenPremium.description: The total expected premium amount for the insurance policy over the policy period.

HasAnyAutoCoverage.description: Indicates whether the insurance policy has an Any Auto coverage, which extends the coverage to hired and other non-owned vehicles. The default value is False.

IntermediaryAccountId.description: The Intermediary Account associated with the Insurance Policy.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the policy is active. The default value is False.Creating or updating an InsurancePolicy sets IsActive automatically based on the Status field value. For example, you can set IsActive to False by setting Status to Inactive.

IsLoanEligibile.description: Indicates whether a loan can be requested against the insurance policy. The default value is False.

IsPolicyEditLocked.description: Indicates whether the application locks the policy record. The default value is False.

IsRenewedPolicy.description: Indicates whether the policy is a renewed policy. The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LineOfBusiness.description: The line of business associated with the policy.

LineOfCoverage.description: The coverage type of the policy.

Name.description: The insurance policy number.

NameInsuredId.description: The name of the primary insured.

OriginalEffectiveDate.description: The date the original policy went into effect. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

OriginalExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the original policy. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

OriginalPolicyId.description: The ID of the original insurance policy. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

PaidToDate.description: The date up to which the policy is paid for. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

ParentPolicyId.description: The ID of the parent policy that covers this policy. For example, a parent policy can cover an auto policy and home policy.

PastDueAmount.description: The amount past due for the policy.

PaymentDueDate.description: The due date for the next payment of the premium.

PlanTier.description: The class that the insurance policy belongs to. For example, silver, gold, or platinum.

PlanType.description: The type of the insurance policy plan. For example, single life, joint last-to-die, or joint first-to-die (primarily applicable for term insurance).

PolicyCode.description: The code that's unique for the policy across all versions.

PolicyDescription.description: The description of the insurance policy.

PolicyName.description: The name of the insurance policy.

PolicyTerm.description: The time period for which the policy provides coverage. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PolicyType.description: The type of the insurance policy. For example, home, auto, annuity, or life.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium paid by the policy owner for the current billing period.

PremiumCalculationMethod.description: The premium calculation method for a payment period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PremiumFrequency.description: The frequency of the premium payment or billing. For example, monthly, semi-monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

PremiumPaymentType.description: The type of premium payment, such as Advance or Arrears. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PreviousPremium.description: The premium of the policy before it was renewed.

PreviousRenewalDate.description: The most recent renewal date for the insurance policy.

PriorPolicyId.description: The ID of the insurance policy before it was renewed.

ProducerId.description: The ID of the agency or the agent who sold the policy.

ProductId.description: The product that this policy belongs to. For example, if the customer buys a silver auto policy, this field looks up to the silver auto product in the Product object.

RatingDate.description: The date to determine the rating details on a mid-term adjustment, endorsement, or out-of-sequence endorsement to a policy.

ReferencePolicyNumber.description: The reference number of the insurance policy that is renewed when the policy term tracking is continued across multiple policy versions. For example, if a limit is a "Lifetime Limit", then the policy term tracking is tracked across all versions of the policy.

RenewalChannel.description: The channel used to renew the insurance policy.

RenewalDate.description: The next expected policy renewal date. The actual renewal date may be different.

SaleDate.description: The date the policy was sold.

ServicingOffice.description: The address of the office that issued the policy and that services the policy.

SourceOpportunityId.description: The ID of the opportunity from which the policy was created.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

StandardFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

Status.description: The status of the insurance policy.

Substatus.description: The carrier system's substatus code for the insurance policy.

TaxesSurcharges.description: The taxes and surcharges levied on the premium for the insurance policy.

TermFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalStandardAmount.description: The sum of the expected premium, fee, and tax for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalSumInsured.description: The total insured amount. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalTermFeeAmount.description: The current total term fees of all policy versions.

TotalTermPremiumAmount.description: The current total term premium of all policy versions.

TotalTermTaxAmount.description: The current total term taxes of all policy versions.

UnderwritingEntityId.description: Legal entity that underwrote the insurance policy.

UniversalPolicyNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies the policy across different source systems.

WritingCarrierAccountId.description: The Writing Carrier Account associated with the Insurance Policy.

InsurancePolicyAsset.name: InsurancePolicyAsset
InsurancePolicyAsset.description: Represents the customer property insured through the insurance policy.

AssetCode.description: The unique code of the insurance policy asset across all the policy versions.

AssetName.description: The insured customer property. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

CustomerPropertyId.description: The ID of the insured customer property.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from when the asset becomes active on the policy.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date after when the asset becomes inactive on the policy.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the asset.

RelatedInsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The related insurance policy asset id associated with the insurance policy asset. This field is available from API version 54.0 and later.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

StandardFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalTermAmount.description: The sum of the expected premium, tax, and fee for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

InsurancePolicyCoverage.name: InsurancePolicyCoverage
InsurancePolicyCoverage.description: A junction object that associates the InsurancePolicy object with the       ProductCoverage object.

BenefitPaymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payment if the benefit or coverage entails a recurring payout to the insured. For example, monthly, semi-monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

Category.description: The category that the coverage belongs to. For example, benefit, clause, deductible, rider.

CategoryCode.description: A carrier-specific code that identifies the coverage. For example, benefit, clause, or deductible.

CategoryGroup.description: The specific category group. For example, for a liability coverage record, benefit is the category and liability is the category group.

CategoryGroupType.description: The type of the category group.

ContractGroupPlanId.description: The contract group plan associated with the insurance policy coverage.

CoverageCode.description: The unique code of the insurance policy coverage across all the policy versions.

DeathBenefitOptionType.description: The method for the payment of death benefit.

DeductibleAmount.description: The deductible amount that the customer must pay.

Description.description: The description of the coverage.

Discount.description: The discount that was given on the coverage or the benefit.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which the coverage is in effect.

ExpirationDate.description: The date on which the coverage expires.

IncomeOptionType.description: The type of the income option given to the policy participant. For example, periodic payment is an income option type, and annuity is an income option.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The asset covered by this coverage.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy associated with this coverage.

InsurancePolicyParticipantId.description: The insurance policy participant associated with this coverage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LimitAmount.description: The limit of the fixed coverage amount. For example, uninsured motorist coverage of USD 1000.

LimitDate.description: The date from which the coverage limit is in effect. For example, an annuity benefit is valid only after the insured is 60 years old.

LimitPercentage.description: The percentage of the actuals covered by this coverage.

LimitRange.description: The range of the coverage limit. For example, bodily injury coverage with limits as USD 100,000 per person and USD 300,000 per accident.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium paid by the customer for this coverage.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this coverage record in the source system.

StandardFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The ID of the insurance policy associated with the asset. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

InsurancePolicyParticipantId.description: The ID of the insured policy participant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

InsurancePolicyParticipant.name: InsurancePolicyParticipant
InsurancePolicyParticipant.description: A junction object that associates the InsurancePolicy object with the Account       object. This object represents the participants of an insurance policy. Insurance policy       participants include policy owners and beneficiaries.

BeneficiarySharePercentage.description: The percentage of the total benefits that goes to the nominee.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which the participant is active on the policy.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from when the participant becomes active on the policy.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date after when the participant becomes inactive on the policy.

ExpirationDate.description: The date from which the participant is inactive on the policy.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The ID of the insurance policy.

IsActiveParticipant.description: Indicates whether the participant is an active participant on the policy. The default value is False.

IsMinorBeneficiary.description: Indicates whether the nominee is a minor. The default value is False.

IsPolicyholder.description: Indicates whether this client owns the policy or is just a participant on the policy. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LegalGuardianId.description: The legal guardian of the minor beneficiary. This can be a business account or a person account.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

ParticipantCode.description: The unique code of the insurance policy participant across all the policy versions.

ParticipantName.description: The name of the participant of the insurance policy.

PrimaryParticipantAccountId.description: The ID of the primary participant's account.

PrimaryParticipantContactId.description: The ID of the primary participant's contact.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the participant.

RelatedParticipantAccountId.description: The ID of the related participant's account.

RelatedParticipantContactId.description: The ID of the related participant's contact.

RelationshipToInsured.description: The relationship of the nominee with the insured.

Role.description: The roles that the participant has in the policy. For example, owner, beneficiary, driver.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

StandardFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

InsurancePolicySurcharge.name: InsurancePolicySurcharge
InsurancePolicySurcharge.description: Represents the charges calculated for an insurance policy and its related       assets, coverages, and participants in a region.

ApplicableObjectType.description: Specifies the item on which the surcharge was applied.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The insurance policy asset associated with the surcharge.

InsurancePolicyCoverageId.description: The insurance policy coverage associated with the surcharge.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy associated with the surcharge.

InsurancePolicyParticipantId.description: The insurance policy participant associated with the surcharge.

InsurancePolicyTransactionId.description: The insurance policy transaction associated with the surcharge.

IsProrationAllowed.description: Indicates whether the term surcharge amount is prorated based on the policy            duration.

IsRefundAllowed.description: Indicates whether the term surcharge amount is eligible for refund.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the insurance policy surcharge.

ProductSurchargeId.description: The product surcharge associated with an insurance policy surcharge.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system from which this insurance policy surcharge was            obtained.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the insurance policy surcharge record in the source system. This            field is unique within your organization.

SurchargeAmount.description: The surcharge amount calculated for an insurance policy, insurance policy            asset, insurance policy coverage, or an insurance policy participant. This            surcharge is calculated based on the tax and fee structure defined for            products or can be retrieved from a source system.

TermSurchargeAmount.description: The surcharge amount calculated for the duration of an insurance policy,            insurance policy asset, insurance policy coverage, or insurance policy            participant.

Type.description: Specifies the type of surcharge.

InsurancePolicyTransaction.name: InsurancePolicyTransaction
InsurancePolicyTransaction.description: Represents a transaction related to a change that affects the premium of an       insurance policy, such as an endorsement, renewal, or cancellation.

Category.description: Specifies the transaction category for the insurance policy.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date from when the transaction becomes effective.

InsurancePolicyId.description: The insurance policy this transaction is related to.

InsurancePolicyVersionId.description: The current version of the insurance policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this            record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this            value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced            (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the transaction.

ParentTransactionId.description: The transaction this insurance policy transaction is related to. For            example, a charge transaction is the parent transaction for a payment made            against that charge.

PostedDate.description: The date when the customer was charged for the insurance policy.

Status.description: The current status of a policy transaction.

TotalTransactionAmount.description: The total amount of transaction, including transaction fee and tax.

TransactionFeeAmount.description: The prorated fee for the transaction.

TransactionNumber.description: An identifier for the transaction from an external system.

TransactionPostedDate.description: The date on which the amount was charged to the customer.

TransactionTaxAmount.description: The prorated tax on the transaction amount.

Type.description: Specifies the type of transaction.

InsuranceProfile.name: InsuranceProfile
InsuranceProfile.description: Represents the insurance-related attributes for the insured member.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact related to this insurance profile.

IsAlcoholAbuser.description: Indicates whether the person has a history of alcohol abuse. The default value is False.

IsAlcoholConsumer.description: Indicates whether the person consumes alcohol. The default value is False.

IsDrugAbuser.description: Indicates whether the person has a history of drug abuse. The default value is False.

IsGoodDriver.description: Indicates whether the person is categorized as a good driver. The default value is False.

IsGoodStudent.description: Indicates whether the person is categorized as a good student. The default value is False.

IsHighRiskOccupation.description: Indicates whether the person’s current employment is a high-risk job. The default value is False.

IsLicenseSuspended.description: Indicates whether the insured member’s driver’s license was ever suspended. The default value is False.

IsTobaccoConsumer.description: Indicates whether the person consumes tobacco. The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MajorCitationCount.description: The number of major citations the person had when the policy was created.

MinorCitationCount.description: The number of minor citations the person had when the policy was created.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

NumberOfAccidents.description: The number of accidents the insured member was involved in.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.

ExpectedRevenueAmount.description: The revenue amount that the brokerage is expected to earn from the                       rate plan.

GeoStateId.description: The location where the rate plan is applicable.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

TotalFeeAmount.description: The total fee amount for the rate plan.

TotalPremiumEqvAmount.description: The total premium equivalent amount that's used for a fully                       insured equivalent rate plan.

PremiumPercent.description: The percentage of premium to be earned as commission when graded                       percent of premium or flat percent of premium is selected.

Type.description: Specifies the type of commission structure.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the                       currency ISO code associated with the record.

EnrollmentCount.description: The number of employees that are insured at a specific tier.

FeeAmount.description: The fee amount for the insurance plan for a specific tier.

InsuranceRatePlanId.description: The parent insurance rate plan that's associated with the line                       item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the line item.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium amount for the insurance plan for a specific                       tier.

PremiumEqvAmount.description: The premium equivalent amount for the insurance plan for a                       specific tier.

Rate.description: The rate at which the employer contributes for the insurance for                       each employee.

RateBasisAmount.description: The basis amount that's used to calculate the insurance rate or                       fee value.

RateQualifierAmount.description: A per unit amount that's used to calculate premiums for benefit                       volume or covered payroll based plans.

Tier.description: Specifies the employee tier that's used to determine the plan                       rate.

DateTimeValue.description: The date time value of the attribute.

DateValue.description: The date value of the attribute.
